page.title: 14SUTTON PARK PASTIMES
page.content: THE PARK IS A POPULAR VENUE FOR ORGANISED EVENTS LIKE SPONSORED WALKS ,CYCLO_CROSS AND CROSS COUNTRY RUNNING ,AND FOR SEVERAL YEARS HAS BEEN USED AS A SPECIAL STAGE OF THE RAC RALLY,WHICH IS HELD IN NOVEMBER.THE SUTTON COLDFIELD CHARITIES CARNIVAL TAKES PLACE ON THE MEADOW PLATT IN JUNE EACH YEAR.WHATEVER THE WEATHER ,VISITORS WILL FIND THE GOING EASY BY CONFINING THEMSELVES TO SOME METALLED ROADS IN THE CENTRAL AREAS WHICH ARE NOW CLOSED TO TRAFFIC .FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO TAKE A REWARDING WALK TO ONE OF THE LESS FREQUENTED SPOTS THERE ARE MANY FIRM PATHS OVER THE HEATHLAND AND THROUGH THE WOODLANDS.
